Product Title: LIAZAHAIR Deep Curly Brazilian Virgin Hair Lace Front Wig With Baby Hair Pre-Plucked Natural Hairline Wigs For Ladies
Review Date: 2018/06/06
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.9 x 7.6 x 2.4 inches; 11.36 Ounces', 'UPC': '788988045717'}
Review Text: This is my first 100% human haired wig, I usually buy synthetic blends. I love the way this hair feels, it feels so soft & the density of this hair is just right, it’s not too thick or thin. The part is already pre-plucked, but I’ll likely customize it further &  dye the hair black because it’s too brown for my liking. Other than that, this wig is perfect.
Review Title: I love the way this hair feels
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Product Title: Fly Pre-twisted Passion Twist Hair Natural Black Pre-looped Passion Twists Water Wave Crochet Hair 14Inch Fly Spring Twist Hair Crochet Braids

Store: Shoobidoo
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Shoobidoo', 'Color': 'black', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '14 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Package Dimensions': '10 x 8 x 2 inches; 1.34 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'passon'}
Review Text: At first look I thought the hair was unraveled but then I realized it was the style of the hair. The hair had a slight smell nothing overpowering, that a soak in vinegar water couldn't fix. The pre loops are a good size and the twists are perfect length for the style I was going for.
Review Title: Nice
Rating: 5.0

raw_response:
**Summary of Shopping Preferences and Patterns:**

1. **Beauty and Personal Care**: The buyer shows a strong inclination towards beauty products, particularly related to hair and makeup. This includes items for hair removal, wigs, and eyebrow makeup.

2. **Wigs and Hair Extensions**: There’s evident interest in both synthetic and human hair extensions, emphasizing texture and customization. Positive experiences with human hair wigs contrast with mixed feedback on synthetic options.

3. **Hair Care Tools**: The buyer frequently explores tools that enhance hair styling, such as adjustable wig bands and curling products, although responses indicate varying satisfaction with effectiveness.

4. **Travel Accessories**: Purchases include travel kits, indicating a need for convenience and comfort during traveling, especially in light of current health considerations.

5. **Diverse Ratings**: Purchase history reflects a mix of satisfaction (with high ratings for some products) and disappointment (low ratings for others), illustrating a careful but perhaps trial-and-error approach to shopping.

6. **Preference for Convenience**: The customer values products that simplify beauty routines (e.g., ergonomic designs for wig bands, easy-to-use eyebrow stencils).

Overall, the consumer prioritizes hair styling and beauty convenience, frequently experimenting with new products while remaining attentive to quality and efficacy.

target_interaction.title: I like it
target_interaction.text: I used these bundles & a got a 5x5 closure for a sew in.  The hair is nice and soft, has a decent amount of fullness, doesn’t shed or tangle too much. I wore the bundles for about 4 weeks & plan to reuse them.
target_interaction.title_meta: Brazilian Virgin Hair Body Wave Bundles 10A Unprocessed Brazilian Human Hair Weave Body Wave Hair Weave Extensions Brazilian Body Wave Human Hair 3 Bundles Body Wave (18 20 22 Inch)
